titles.title: To require the Securities and Exchange Commission, when developing rules and regulations about disclosures to retail investors, to conduct investor testing, including a survey and interviews of retail investors, and for other purposes.
SEC Disclosure Effectiveness Testing Act

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 33 - 26.

action.text: Reported (Amended) by the Committee on Financial Services. H. Rept. 116-123.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 91.
